title: Aisha_jay
author: Aisha_jay
content: Have you ever had big dreams and wondered how to make them happen?Dreams are like the stars in the sky, shining, brightly, and full of possibilities. By setting valuable goals, you're not only turning your dreams into reality, but you're also giving yourself a clear path to follow. So, what are your dreams, and how will you turn them into reality with valuable goals?

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Dreams without goals are just wishes But are wishes without dreams really goals?

comments.author: JackieKing
comments.body: Yes, I've had dreams big and small. I have also thought about how to make them a reality. Some dreams, hopes and aspirations of the mind have been fulfilled by the great Lord. Hopes, dreams, needs etc. are involved in human life. It is normal for people to have some dreams and it is abnormal not to have them. Hopes and dreams are of immense importance if we want to enjoy our lives. Not just a dream. We have to work hard and have unwavering faith in the Lord to make our dreams come true. He will fulfill all my hopes one day Insha Allah.
